title: 15. Your company is migrating all applications from the on-premises data centre to Google Cloud, and one of the applications is dependent on Websockets protocol and session affinity. You want to ensure this application can be migrated to Google Cloud platform and continue serving requests without issues. What should you do?
alternatives: A. Modify application code to not depend on session affinity.
B. Review the design with the security team.
C. Modify application code to use HTTP streaming.
D. Discuss load balancer options with the relevant teams.
